title: Overview
description: Want to build a powerful web app without developing and maintaining a codebase for every single component? modular-ui is what you are looking for. Just install it and import what you need, without any additional code, but with full control on every component (all of them are completely customizable, expecially when used with #LINK https://tailwindcss.com/#Tailwind #LINK class names). This library is used by #LINK https://github.com/CianciarusoCataldo/react-ready-to-go#react-ready-to-go #LINK (this web-app is built upon it, check it out to know more! )
componentsList_header: Modular-ui is a collection of various components, adaptable for every use. Click on every component to see its details
installation_body: Per prima cosa, posizionati nella root del tuo progetto ed installa modular-ui: #CODEnpm i @cianciarusocataldo/modular-ui#CODE Dopo l'installazione, importa i componenti della libreria direttamente nella tua app, ad esempio: #CODE#LANGjavascript#LANGimport { Button, Page } from '@cianciarusocataldo/modular-ui';#CODE
